greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: G.f.: (2-x)/((1+3x)(1-4x)); e.g.f.: exp(4x) + exp(-3x); a(n) = 4^n + (-3)^n.
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,12).
formula: a(n) = a(n-1) + 12*a(n-2) for n > 1; a(0)=2, a(1)=1. - _Philippe Deléham_, Sep 19 2009
mathematica: CoefficientList[Series[(2 - z)/((1 + 3 z) (1 - 4 z)), {z, 0, 200}], z] (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Jun 11 2011 *)
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Sep 06 2003
